metadata.title: Husband's tribute to mother-of-two killed by falling tree branch in Blackburn

left: A woman named Madia Kauser, 32, died after being hit by a falling tree branch in Witton Park, Blackburn, on August 11, 2025.

Her husband, Wasim Khan, expressed deep sorrow, saying, 'Honestly, I feel completely lost without her and I do not know how to put into words how much I miss her face, her character, and her presence.'
Detective Inspector Iain Czapowski described the incident as 'absolutely tragic' and extended condolences to Kauser's loved ones.
Police are seeking witnesses and request anyone with information to contact them using log 1553 of August 11.
